scripts.dev: lsof -ti :8787 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; infisical run --env dev -- sh -c 'scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env dev && vite dev --port 8787'
scripts.dev:wrangler: lsof -ti :8787 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null; infisical run --env dev -- sh -c 'scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env dev && WRANGLER_ENV=dev bun run build && bun run wrangler dev --env dev'
scripts.deploy:staging: infisical run --env staging -- sh -c 'scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env staging && bun run build && bun run wrangler deploy'
scripts.deploy:prod: infisical run --env prod -- sh -c 'scripts/generate-wrangler-config.sh --env prod && bun run build && bun run wrangler deploy'
scripts.test:e2e: infisical run --env dev -- npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: infisical run --env dev -- npx playwright test --ui --headed
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck
scripts.db:init:dev: echo 'Initializing local D1 database with migrations...' && for dir in $(ls -d drizzle/*/ 2>/dev/null | sort); do migration_file="$dir/migration.sql"; if [ -f "$migration_file" ]; then echo "Applying migration: $(basename $dir)"; npx wrangler d1 execute workout-dev-db --local --file="$migration_file" || echo "Migration may already be applied"; fi; done && echo 'Database initialization complete. Run \"bun run dev\" to start the server.'
scripts.db:push:dev: for dir in drizzle/*/; do npx wrangler d1 execute workout-dev-db --local --file="$dir/migration.sql" 2>/dev/null || true; done
